subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Detailed review and understanding of the new regulation, its implications, and requirements.
subtasks.notes: This task is crucial as it sets the foundation for all other tasks.

subtasks.name: Gap Analysis
subtasks.description: Perform a gap analysis to identify areas where the company is not in compliance with the new regulation.
subtasks.notes: This task requires a deep understanding of both the regulation and the company's current practices.

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Develop a plan to address the gaps identified in the gap analysis.
subtasks.notes: This task requires a strategic approach and careful planning.

subtasks.name: Implement Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Implement the compliance plan across the organization.
subtasks.notes: This task requires coordination across multiple teams and departments.

subtasks.name: Training and Education
subtasks.description: Train employees on the new regulation and the changes implemented.
subtasks.notes: This task is crucial to ensure employees understand the new regulation and their responsibilities.

subtasks.name: Monitoring and Reporting
subtasks.description: Monitor compliance with the new regulation and report to the relevant authorities as required.
subtasks.notes: This task is ongoing and requires regular attention.

key_risks: Failure to fully understand the regulation could lead to non-compliance.
Failure to properly implement the compliance plan could lead to non-compliance.
Failure to adequately train employees could lead to non-compliance.

subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Read and understand the regulation, focusing on its implications for the business
subtasks.notes: This task requires a good understanding of legal language and concepts, which the business owner may not have. Legal consultation might be needed.

subtasks.name: Identifying AI Models in Use
subtasks.description: Identify any AI models currently in use within the business
subtasks.notes: This task requires a technical understanding of AI models, which the business owner may not have. Technical consultation might be needed.

subtasks.name: Implementing Transparency Requirements
subtasks.description: Implement transparency requirements for AI model training and use
subtasks.notes: This task requires both technical and legal expertise. Consultation might be needed.

subtasks.name: Employee Training
subtasks.description: Train employees on the protections, rights, and obligations under the new regulation
subtasks.notes: This task requires an understanding of HR training methods and the ability to communicate legal concepts to non-experts.

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of penalties due to non-compliance
Risk of business disruption during implementation of new requirements
